name: Grimland RPG Clicker
description:
Hi everyone I'm newbie that started to learn Godot 3 months ago during this quarantine time, I have a full time job as software engineer so I can only spend 1 or 2 hours in the evening and my weekends to learn Godot

and now I'd like to showcase Grimland, my first HTML 5 RPG Clicker  that currently still in development

key features of Grimland :

- Equipment Skills that allow user to create a mix set ( inspired by Monster Hunter :D )

- Mercenaries to hire for DPS and also buff the player

- Player skills to upgrade

- Boss battle and Monsters that actually hit back
